topquizbackend

Class InteractiveQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • topquizbackend.Question
      • topquizbackend.InteractiveQuestion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InteractiveQuestion
extends Question
    The InteractiveQuestion class contains the back-end IA Question data and the methods needed in the back-end for the proper execution of front-end methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • InteractiveQuestion

        public InteractiveQuestion()
        Basic Constructor Not advisable to use, will result in errors.

      • InteractiveQuestion

        public InteractiveQuestion(java.lang.String questionText,
                           java.lang.String correctAnswer,
                           int score)
        Inherited Constructor from the Super. Not advisable to use, will result in errors.
        Parameters:
        questionText - String for the Question's text
        correctAnswer - String for the Question's correct answer
        score - int for the Question's point-valueas a score.

      • InteractiveQuestion

        public InteractiveQuestion(java.lang.String questionText,
                           java.lang.String correctAnswer,
                           int score,
                           java.lang.String imageFileName,
                           java.lang.String choiceA,
                           java.lang.String choiceB,
                           java.lang.String choiceC,
                           java.lang.String choiceD)
        Robust Constructor for the InteractiveQuestion class. Inherits some parameters from the super-class. Also sets the filename for the Image used in InteractiveQuestions, as well as the various choices for answering based on that image.
        Parameters:
        questionText - String for the Question's text
        correctAnswer - String for the Question's correct answer
        score - int for the Question's point-value as a score.
        imageFileName - String for the filename/location of the Image to be displayed with the InteractiveQuestion
        choiceA - String for the IAQ's choice A
        choiceB - String for the IAQ's choice B
        choiceC - String for the IAQ's choice C
        choiceD - String for the IAQ's choice D

      • getSpecificChoice

        public java.lang.String getSpecificChoice(int choice)
        A more robust getter method which returns a specific answer choice for this InteractiveQuestion
        Parameters:
        choice - int denoting which choice from choices array is desired
        Returns:
        String of the appropriate choice.
